item.title: A root used for curing ill people
item.summary: Descriptions and names of roots and plants used to cure a variety of ailments such as headaches.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book IV-1
item.storypages: not numbered (inserts inside back cover of A2_1_44)

keyword.subkw: using a root called 'Leuuwhoud' and other preparations
called 'Leuuwhoud' and other preparations used for curing illness
